p: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.
q: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
w: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, increasing their damage and speed.
e: Aurelion Sol takes off flying for a long distance.
r: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.

blurd: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his...
name: Aurelion-Sol
title: The Star Forger
